title: Thailand
details: Day 1: Flight from Dhaka to Phuket International Airport, Day 2: Explore Phuket, Day 3: Flight to Bangkok and check in at hotel, Day 4: Explore Bangkok and overnight stay at Bangkok, Day 5: Fly back to Dhaka.

title: Nepal
details: Day 1: Arrive Kathmandu Airport then transfer to hotel, Day 2: Free day at Kathmandu, Day 3: Kathmandu sightseeing - Kathmandu stay, Day 4: Kathmandu hotel to Kathmandu airport, depart back to Dhaka.

title: Malayasia
details: Day 1: Langkawi International Airport - Hotel Transfer, Day 2: Fly to Langkawi, Day 3: Explore Langkawi and overnight stay, Day 4: Explore Kuala Lumpur, Day 5: Kuala Lumpur - Departure Flight to Dhaka.

title: Singapore
details: Day 1: Arrival at Changi International Airport, Singapore - Hotel Transfer, Day 2: Visit Universal Studios Singapore, Day 3: Full Day Sightseeing at Sentosa, Day 4: Singapore Hotel - Return to Dhaka.

title: Vietnam
details: Day 1: Fly to Hanoi and stay overnight, Day 2: Hanoi - Ha Long Bay - stay overnight cruise ship (B/L/D), Day 3: Ha Long Bay - Hanoi (B/L), Day 4: Return to airport and fly back to Dhaka Airport.

title: Bhutan
details: Day 1: Arrival - Paro Airport, Thimphu and sightseeing, Day 2: Full Day sightseeing at Punakha, Day 3: Full Day sightseeing at Tiger nest base point, Paro, Day 4: After breakfast fly back to Dhaka.

title: Indonesia
details: Day 1: Transfer to Bali Hotel from airport, Day 2: Bali Ubud and Kintamani Tour, Day 3: Free Day at Kuta, Day 4: Nusa Dua & Uluwatu Temple Tour, Day 5: Transfer From Bali Hotel to Denpasar Airport.

title: India
details: Day 1: Delhi - Agra, Day 2: Agra City Tour, Day 3: Agra - Vrindavan-Delhi, Day 4: Full day sightseeing at Delhi, Day 5: Jaipur city tour all day long, Day 6: After breakfast proceed to Delhi airport.

title: Maldives
details: Day 1: Arrival at Hulhumale airport-Transfer to the hotel, Day 2: After having breakfast at the hotel, the rest of the day is for your own purpose, Day 3: Departure from Velana International Airport.
